version_description:
- Added solo mining
Just point your miner to:
Pool: solo.ckpool.org
Port: 3333
Worker: [you bitcoin wallet].worker1

- Redesigned mining algorithm
Solo mining
Pool: solo.ckpool.org
Port: 3333
Worker: [your wallet address].worker1

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Fixes crash issue if socket connection error
Solo mining Configuration:
Pool: solo.ckpool.org
Port: 3333
Worker: {yourbitcoinwalletaddress}.worker1
Password: x
Good luck and happy mining!
